snippet.title: Esoteric Ebb | Partnership Announcement
snippet.description:
Raw Fury welcomes Esoteric Ebb and its developer, Christoffer Bodegard, to the Raw Fury family!

ESOTERIC EBB is a single-player CRPG inspired by the freedom of tabletop adventures. Unravel a political conspiracy with your goblin sidekick. Roll dice in tense encounters. Become a cleric of legends or completely ruin the campaign. After all, what's life without interesting outcomes?

Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/3F433UV
